        public final Set<Problem> validateRule(MonitoringRule rule,
                        List<MonitoringRule> otherRules)
        Checks if the action expressed in the rule exists and if all required parameters were specified. Then calls the action specific validation check, i.e., validate().
        Parameters:
        rule -
        otherRules -
        Returns:
        the set of problems found during the validation, an empty set otherwise.
